noun.description: The action, process, or result of arranging or being arranged.
examples: the arrangement of the furniture in the room

noun.description: Plans or preparations for a future event.
examples: all the arrangements for the wedding were made

noun.description: A composition adapted for performance with different instruments or voices than those originally specified.
examples: Mozart's symphonies in arrangements for cello and piano

noun.description: A settlement of a dispute or claim.
